title: LGBT Fostering the Future
description:
LGBT: Fostering the Future
Save The Date
Come along to a panel discussion about LGBT parenthood and the need for LGBT individuals and couples as foster parents. There will speakers from To the Moon and Back Fostering, Encompass Network, a Care Leaver to speak about their experiences, an LGBT freelance Assessor and a final speaker to be confirmed.
Find out about what it takes to be a foster parent and how LGBT individuals are uniquely suited to provide specialist care for children desperately in need.
